breakfast.title: Greek Yogurt Protein Bowl
breakfast.description: Greek yogurt topped with granola, berries, and a scoop of protein powder for a quick morning boost.

lunch.title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
lunch.description: Grilled chicken breast with romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, and caesar dressing in a whole wheat tortilla.

dinner.title: Pan-Seared Salmon with Quinoa
dinner.description: Quick-seared salmon fillet served over cooked quinoa with steamed broccoli and lemon.

breakfast.title: Three-Egg Veggie Scramble
breakfast.description: Scrambled eggs with spinach, bell peppers, and cheddar cheese served with whole grain toast.

lunch.title: Tuna and White Bean Salad
lunch.description: Canned tuna mixed with cannellini beans, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and olive oil dressing.

dinner.title: Ground Beef Stir-Fry
dinner.description: Lean ground beef stir-fried with mixed vegetables and served over brown rice with soy sauce.

breakfast.title: Protein Pancakes
breakfast.description: Quick pancakes made with protein powder, eggs, and oats, topped with Greek yogurt and berries.

lunch.title: Turkey and Hummus Wrap
lunch.description: Sliced turkey breast with hummus, cucumber, and lettuce wrapped in a large whole wheat tortilla.

dinner.title: Baked Cod with Sweet Potato
dinner.description: Herb-crusted baked cod fillet with roasted sweet potato wedges and green beans.

breakfast.title: Cottage Cheese Power Bowl
breakfast.description: Cottage cheese mixed with chopped nuts, sliced banana, and a drizzle of honey for natural sweetness.

lunch.title: Chicken and Black Bean Bowl
lunch.description: Seasoned grilled chicken over black beans and rice with salsa, avocado, and shredded cheese.

dinner.title: Pork Tenderloin with Vegetables
dinner.description: Sliced pork tenderloin pan-seared and served with roasted Brussels sprouts and quinoa pilaf.

breakfast.title: Protein Smoothie Bowl
breakfast.description: Blended protein smoothie with banana, spinach, and protein powder topped with granola and chia seeds.

lunch.title: Lentil and Chicken Soup
lunch.description: Quick-cooking red lentils simmered with diced chicken breast, carrots, and celery in chicken broth.

dinner.title: Shrimp and Pasta
dinner.description: Large shrimp sautéed with garlic and served over whole wheat pasta with parmesan cheese and spinach.
